cab.content: (This Document is the Property ofHis Britannic iyiajesty's Government)17SECRET.From :- British Mission, Paris. To :- War Office, London.Handed in 7.0 a.m. Dec. 7th 1917.Received 9,45 a.m, Dec 7th 1917,11542.Following for Colonel Fagalde for Director of Military Operations and Intelligence.Chief of French Mission Military Fetrograd wires December 4th that according to reliable information several German Staff officers are with Bolcheviki in Petrog-r ad.
